Title: Tractors
Plot: Top Gear presents to you the Lamborghini Murcielago LP640. In an attempt to find an alternative source of fuel Top Gear goes green. Also this week, Jeremy makes a public information film. To the absolute delight of Jeremy, Kristin Scott Thomas is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
